title: Topic 1: Mendel's Law of Inheritance
name: topic1
description: Study how to predict genotypes and phenotypes of parents and offsprings using the laws of inheritance.

title: Topic 2 : Sex Linkage
name: topic2
description: Learn about sex linkage and recombination.

title: Topic 3 : Central Dogma of Molecular Biology
name: topic3
description: Understand the molecular structure of DNA, RNA and proteins and be able to diagram the steps in DNA replication and protein synthesis.

title: Topic 4 : Recombinant DNA
name: topic4
description: Study the processes involved in Genetic Engineering and you will be able to learn the applications of Recombinant DNA
